alert.note: Alert for Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:56PM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In New York, Western Albany and Western Greene Counties. In Vermont, Western Windham County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley areas will see snow mixed with rain through late Sunday afternoon, reducing snow accumulations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
